mods.abstract: Female adult, Madame Alexander doll, plastic head on plastic body, rubber arms, sleeping eyes, synthetic hair wig, swivel neck, jointed at shoulders, elbows, hips, and knees, white lace trimmed underwear, under-skirt, red polished cotton knee-length dress, white band on sleeves, three buttons on front bodice, white wide brimmed hat with white veil-like ribbon, skin color long stockings, black high heel shoes, earrings, all, machine-made, label attached, TO ALL LITTLE GIRLS EVERYWHERE Elise. Made by Madame Alexander is A Gift to Cherish.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
